mapper.select: SELECT b.postId, b.title, b.categoryCode, b.content, b.createdAt, b.postStatus, b.startDay, b.userCode, b.startCash, b.finalCash, i.imageUrl FROM board b LEFT JOIN imageUrl i ON b.postId = i.postId;
